sb.easingLabel: A label of an easing function.
sb.getHexColorFromHSB:
Calculates the hexadecimal representation of a color from the `hue`,
`saturation` and `brightness` of that the color.
sb.getHexColorFromHSB|param|brightness: Brightness of the color ranging from `0` to `100`
sb.getHexColorFromHSB|param|hue: Hue of the color ranging from `0` to `100`
sb.getHexColorFromHSB|param|saturation: Saturation of the color ranging from `0` to `100`
sb.getHexColorFromRGB:
Calculates the hexadecimal representation of a color from the amounts of
`red`, `green` and `blue` in that the color.
sb.getHexColorFromRGB|param|blue: Amount of blue in color ranging from `0%` to `100%`
sb.getHexColorFromRGB|param|green: Amount of green in color ranging from `0%` to `100%`
sb.getHexColorFromRGB|param|red: Amount of red in color ranging from `0%` to `100%`
sb.rgbLedLabel: A label of a RGB LED.
sb.setContinuousServoSpeed:
Sets the speed of a continuous servo in a arbitrary range from `-100%` to
`100%`. If the connected servo is not continuous, this will not work as
expected.
sb.setContinuousServoSpeed|param|servo: Which continuous servo to set the speed to.
sb.setRgbLedColor: Sets the color of an individual RGB LED by specifying the color by name.
sb.setRgbLedColorHSB:
Sets the color of an individual RGB LED by specifying the amount of
hue, saturation and brightness in the color. The amounts range from
`0%` to `100%`.
sb.setRgbLedColorHSB|param|brightness: Brightness of the color, ranging from `0%` to `100%`.
sb.setRgbLedColorHSB|param|hue: Hue of the color, ranging from `0%` to `100%`.
sb.setRgbLedColorHSB|param|rgbLed: Which RGB LED to set the color.
sb.setRgbLedColorHSB|param|saturation: Saturation of the color, ranging from `0%` to `100%`.
sb.setRgbLedColorRGB:
Sets the color of an individual RGB LED by specifying the amount of
red, green and blue in the color. The amounts range from `0%` to
`100%`.
sb.setRgbLedColorRGB|param|blue: Amount of blue in color ranging, from `0%` to `100%`.
sb.setRgbLedColorRGB|param|green: Amount of green in color ranging, from `0%` to `100%`.
sb.setRgbLedColorRGB|param|red: Amount of red in color ranging, from `0%` to `100%`.
sb.setRgbLedColorRGB|param|rgbLed: Which RGB LED to set the color.
sb.setRgbLedColor|param|color: The name of the color from a list of color labels.
sb.setRgbLedColor|param|rgbLed: Which RGB LED to set the color.
sb.setServoPosition:
Sets the position of a servo by specifying a value ranging from `0%` to
`100%`.
sb.setServoPosition|param|servo: Which servo to set the position to.
sb.transitionServoPosition:
Transtions the position of a servo over a duration of time (in seconds).
The "shape" of the transition is specified by choosing one of the easing
functions by name.
sb.transitionServoPosition|param|duratio: The duration of the transition, in seconds.
sb.transitionServoPosition|param|servo: Which servo to set the position to.
sb.turnOffServo:
Turns a servo off so that no force will be applied and it can be rotated
manually. This saves battery.
sb.wave:
Samples the vale of a periodic wave function. The wave starts at the
beginning of the running time. It can be configured by specifying it's
length (in seconds), amplitude and offset.
sb.waveTypeLabel: A label of a wave type.
sb.wave|param|length: The length (or period) of the wave, in seconds.
